name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, increases follow-up attack DMG by 4%, stacking up to 24 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
enhanced_desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, increases follow-up attack DMG by 5%, stacking up to 30 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
